name: Lab of Slimes
description:
The Lab of Slimes is a bullet hell dungeon crawler game that takes place in a mysterious laboratory. The entire place has been overrun with slimes! Battle your way through rooms while collecting new weapons to escape!

You can also play a webgl version here: https://labofslime.netlify.app/

Update 1.1: Hopefully fixed wall clipping, nerfed flamethrower, and fixed some other bugs.
